reviews.review:
Amazing, with a very intriguing concept solving puzzles with portals being shot from the"Aperture Handheld Portal Device" 
Very good story and was very fun playing overall.
Muy buen juego, sin duda merece toda la gama y elogios que me dedican siempre.
The best puzzle game I've played! Looking forward to Portal 2
Portal was a very fun game, I usually dont play games I dont feel I will like, but this game was pretty awesome for a puzzle game. No complaints!

Безусловно я говорю этой игре ДА! Эта игра 100% понравится каждому. Решать задачки всегда приятно. Ее единственный минус, что ее мало! Хочется еще и еще. А купил я ее вообще для наклеек ) А тут такое)
Советую каждому  поиграть!
Incredible how it combines simplicity and the brainstorm that goes in your head.
Great game, although it took about 2 hrs to beat. Still a great game.
Jogo excelente..muito bom
A cube gave me feelings.

Oh My Gosh. This is a game thats not very long but the game will leave an impact on you. This game held my number 1 favorite game of all time for a long time only being beaten by Undertale. You will love everything about this game! Its best to jump in blind though, so BUY THIS GAME!
There is no sense crying over every mistake, you just keep on trying until you run out of cake.

J'y jouerais jamais assez. Rien à redire. Meilleur jeu solo auquel j'ai jamais joué.

Conclusion: Meilleur jeu solo de ma vie.

Wow, what a great game! The portal concept is just so awesome, Every time I did the jumping thing to get somewhere high up I was on the edge of my seat.

Can't wait to play portal 2.

Muito bom! 
Recomendo
Так и не дали съесть тортик(((
good game !!!!!!
One of the best games I have ever played if not the best. This is definitely a must play. The second game just makes this one so much better too!
The cake was a lie.
Sehr nettes Denkspiel, leider zu wenig Level

Portal é um jogo incrivelmente divertido. Apesar de curto, possui uma física ótima, a qual deve ser usada para resolver os puzzles, que podem ser bem desafiadores, mas não impossíveis. Além de ser um jogo inteligente, é bem engraçado também, graças a presença da inteligência artificial GlaDos, que promete UM BOLO para quem realizar os testes.

I never thought that there really exists a first person 'shooter'-like game that is really different from others. This game was even favored by my girlfriend who never plays any shooter-games at all.

Positive:
+ Fun and interesting story
+ Easy gameplay
+ fun puzzles which sometimes are really challanging
+ cake

Negative:
- nothing really
할거없을때 가끔씩 하면 질리질 않는게임. 포탈2랑 스토리 연관성 굿
开创性的玩法，作为初代完成度也非常高。
Someone finished this game in 8 minuets. I feel bad at games now.
best game ever

딱 적당한 플레이 타임과 난이도라 생각

포탈2만 사는 것보다는 패키지 할인 폭이 크니 같이 사는것을 추천

엔딩곡은 1이 훨씬 좋은듯

Gameplay rápida e simples, a Valve realmente fez um ótimo trabalho com este jogo. Mecânicas exelentes, e para um game de puzzle deveria ser ser mais difícil, mas mesmo assim é um ótimo jogo e é totalmente recomendado.
Игра вцелом ничего. Но затянет максимум на 3-4 часа.Поэтому -
classic. 100/10 must-play.

Oh dear lord, there are no words that could describe how stunning this game is, this a great prequel of a marvelous sequel, one of the few games that let your mind works so hard and gets so far. However you can't get any further if you don't think outside the box. Trust me, it's just a waste of time the fact that you're looking for a convncing review to buy the game because you will be getting it sooner or later.
2017 год, игра офигенная! по больше бы таких!:)
GoodGame

Kupiłem na świątecznej wyprzedaży i bardzo się cieszę. Paczka obydwu Portali za mniej niż 5€, to prawie darmo, a gra jest świetna.
Zagadki podstawowego wątku fabularnego nie są wprawdzie zbyt trudne, ale wyzwania stawiane przez dodatkowe mapy w postaci sześciu zaawansowanych zagadek i challange'y na najmniejszą ilość portali, najmniejszą ilość kroków i najkrótszy czas na sześciu różnych mapach, już takie proste nie jest.
Ponadto klimat tworzony przed np. głos GlaDOS, jej (?) intonacja i absurdlane wypowiedzi, gadające dziewczęcym głosem wierzyczki bojowe i inne drobne detale otoczenia, są genialne i pamiętam je do dziś od czasu kiedy pierszy raz grałem w tą grę. Cieszę się, że mogę znów poczuć ten klimat :)

Don't need to describe further. It's a good game for sure.

its good
一代佳作，二代神作。
this game is amazing a peice of art an instant classic all of the above defently reccomend this game if your thinking about buying this game

玩过第二代来补第一代。说实话，第一代还是比较粗糙的，关卡的设计没有二代巧妙，很多就是靠身法怼过去的。4G的游戏大概一两个小时就通关有点短。不过依然是部好作品啊。

最后，什么时候出3？
Aun siendo tan antiguo, sigue estando muy fresco. Increible

好！……（虽然只有一个字，却是惊天地，泣鬼神，前无古人，后无来者，破天荒的，不拘一格，妙笔生辉的点睛之作。简简单单一个“好”字，包含了中华5000年的文化精髓！深刻表达了回帖者的心声。足以证明作者本人是一个路见不平，拔刀相助的绿林好汉。此贴不仅完美的配合了主题，而且通俗易懂，朗朗上口。使看客一目了然，透彻人心。具有快、准、狠，三大特点。仅此可以证明回帖者是一位上通天文，下通地理，知识渊博，学腹五车，满腹经文并文学修养极好的旷世奇才！相信五百年后，也会出现在小学生的语文课本上，像唐诗三百首一样广为流传！作者本人也会被载入史册，与诸葛亮，关羽，李白，杜甫，岳飞，鲁智深等一样为后世颂扬！最后让我们气运丹田，大吼一声：好…………
Ein sehr gutes und schönes Spiel. Zwar leider sehr kurz aber hat sich trotzdem gelohnt. Kann ich wirklich nur weiter empfehlen!
Ничего лишнего, все продумано до мелочей.

Good Game. At first it is a rather quick game to finish, but the achievement hunt makes for great replay value, not to mention  the story build in Portal 2 makes this game so much better than it originally is.

odeio Puzzles

Juego increíble, Portal y Portal 2 te hace exprimir el cerebro hasta limites insospechados, gran trabajo de los desarrolladores. Su historia y dialogos son fantasticos muy logrados a la traducción al Español. Te hace pasar ratos muy entretenidos, Portal lastima que sea tan corto en comparación con Portal 2 que su historia es algo mas larga. Por favor Valve que haya un Portal 3 pronto (:
Best puzzle game, I like it.

Just a beautiful game. The loneliness gets to you, and the atmosphere is incredible. The puzzles are a little hard, but I like it that way. Little easier than Portal 2, but it's still great. You can beat this game in 5 hours,(counting the advanced levels)
And I definitely enjoyed this game more than Portal 2.(Even though Portal 2 is great)

A classic game for people who like to think.
One of my favorite games ever.

放了很久，今天终于有时间来通关这部游戏，（在头晕到快吐的情况下），个人认为闲暇时玩玩这款游戏是个不错的选择，后续的作品也可以去尝试下，设定很棒，别说了先让我去吐下。

Nunca e jugado antes alguna joya de valve pero decidi comprarme el valve pack para darle una oportunidad y pense en jugar portal por me perecio interesante el echo que este juego te ase un poco pensar de acuerdo ah loa niveles todo lo que aplicas y en un nivel lo tienes que aplicar en otro mas adelante el enemigo me paresio un poco mee pero me gusta el juego es corto,si pero no quita el echo que es entretenido y sus logros,son pocos con el cual puedes desbloquearlos en no muco tiempo,tambien estan los niveles avanzados que ufff....me custan un poquito y el contra relog que esta genial,en definicion el juego es entretenido,jode un poco algunas partes pero...cuando los pasas tienes esa satisfacion que es hmm...... tecientes poderoso xd,si tuviera que recomendar algun juego de puzzles seria la saga portal.
I bought this game for all the hype it has around it. Was disappointed.
This game is super adictive, the puzzles are challenging but not that difficult that you do not want to play anymore. Nothing some brain power and patience cannot fix.

Portal, ese juegazo que no necesita muchas horas para hacerte fiel seguidor de Aperture science y de la ironía de GLaDOS, posee entretenidos y sencillitos puzles y una historia que te deja con ganas de más, suerte que en Portal 2 tuvimos mucho, más y mejor.
Completed the game and gained an awesome cake. 10/10
muy bueno, es recomendado jugar este antes de el 2, bastantes retos, un poco corto pero vale la pena. 8/10
刚热身玩就通关了？不爽啊，BGM通关后看着蛋糕满分！（笑）
Konzept und Gameplay sind genial.
tyj

这个绝对是久仰了N年的经典游戏了，才玩起来。
非常简单的传送门设定，却演变出非常丰富的关卡。
只玩了主线，感觉难度设置的恰到好处，既不会太难，又需要花点脑子。
最后逃生的过程，仅仅一些墙上的涂鸦，便带来了很好的剧情代入感。
总之确实是很经典就对了。
我实在是不知道我搬了这么多椅子全掉风扇下面是啥情况，这么高的天井我也是服。

Portal e Portal 2, são obras de arte, o design do jogo é perfeito, o humor é maravilhoso, dois dos melhores jogos de todos os tempos, impecáveis.
Os jogos ficam muito melhor quando jogados os dois, em seguida.
O jogo não é difícil, mas ele te faz raciocinar mais do que os outros jogos, de uma forma sutíl e muito recompensante. 
Não tenho palavras para descrever a experiência que é jogar estes jogos, é só vivendo para entender...

Bastante recomendado, aunque si bien su historia es un poco corta es demasiada entretenida, con un modo de juego adictivo y entretenido que destaca bastante, ahora a jugar el 2 a ver si es igual o mejor que este!
I was promised cake :(

让人耳目一新，原来FPS还能这样玩！

주변에서 포탈 재밌다는 이야기를 많이 들었는데 확실히 명작인거 같음
Amazing!!! I think that anyone who enjoys puzzle games, sci-fi games, or any weird random games will like this! I really enjoy the weighted companion cube!
